articles.author: Michael Voepel
articles.title: Playoff-bound Clark: 'Big moment,' but not a party - ESPN
articles.description: Caitlin Clark said Wednesday that the end of Indiana's seven-year playoff drought is "definitely a big moment" -- but stressed she came into the organization with the expectation "that this is what's going to happen."
articles.content: Caitlin Clark said she watched the endings to the two games that put the Indiana Fever into the WNBA playoffs Tuesday night then fell asleep. For one thing, it was around midnight ET. But also, Clark… [+2801 chars]
